column2: MD DMV PRACTICE TEST
Question Text
column8: Answer3 Text

column2: 1. This road sign means:
column4: Drivers must turn left on red
column6: Drivers may not turn right on red
column8: T intersection ahead

column2: 2. This sign means:
column8: narrow bridge ahead.

column2: 3. ___________ normally are white rectangles with black letters or symbols.
column8: Warning signs

column2: 4. Driving at night is more dangerous because:
column6: you cannot see as far ahead at night.
column8: the road is more slippery.

column2: 5. What is the main reason night driving is more difficult than daytime driving?
column8: The use of headlight is required by law.

column2: 6. This sign tells drivers that:
column8: left and right turns are not allowed.

column2: 7. Slowing down just to look at collisions or anything else out of ordinary:
column8: helps prevent rear-end collisions.

column2: 8. When a pedestrian carrying a white cane is at the corner ready to cross the street in front of you, before making your right turn, you should:
column4: turn off the ignition until the person crosses the street.
column6: yield the right-of-way and wait until the pedestrian crosses the street.
column8: use your horn to help the pedestrian cross the street.

column2: 9. If a vehicle is coming towards you at night with its high beams on, making it hard to see the road ahead, you should:
column4: look straight ahead towards the middle of the lane.
column6: look ahead towards the right edge of your lane.
column8: look ahead towards the left edge of your lane.

column2: 10. A yellow arrow means:
column4: If you intend to turn in the direction of the arrow, be prepared to stop.
column6: The same as a steady yellow light.
column8: Do not go in the direction of the arrow.

column2: 11. When riding in a vehicle equipped with air bags is, children ages 12 and under are safer:
column4: in the bed of a pick-up truck.
column6: buckled up in the front seat.
column8: buckled up in the back seat.

column2: 12. At intersections marked with stop lines, drivers must:
column8: slow down and enter the intersection.

column2: 13. A traffic sign with a red circle around and a slash over a symbol means:
column4: the maneuver shown by the symbol is not allowed.
column6: the maneuver shown on the sign should be executed with extreme caution.
column8: Do not drive faster than the posted speed limit.

column2: 14. This road sign means:
column8: Steep downgrade

column2: 15. This road sign means:
column8: One-way street ahead

column2: 16. When driving at night with no other vehicles ahead, a driver should use:
column8: high beam lights.

column2: 17. Which statement about driving and drugs is true?
column4: Prescription drugs are safe to use if they don't make you feel drowsy.
column6: Only illegals drugs can impair your driving.
column8: Even over the counter drugs can impair your driving.

column2: 18. What should you do if you see smoke come from under the hood?
column4: Try to fight the fire yourself.
column6: Call the fire department and then pull off the road and park your vehicle.
column8: Pull off the road and park your vehicle. Turn off the ignition, get away from the car and call the fire department.

column2: 19. After parking, are you allowed to open a door on the road side of your vehicle?
column6: Yes, but only if it does not interfere with bicyclists and other traffic.
column8: Yes, always.

column2: 20. When driving in a construction zone you should:
column8: come to a complete stop and check road conditions.

column2: 21. Blocking an intersection during rush hour traffic is not permitted:
column6: unless you entered the intersection on a green light.
column8: unless you have the right-of-way.

column2: 22. Before changing lanes or attempting to pass another vehicle, you should:
column4: check your blind spots and, mirrors.
column6: signal your intention before changing lanes.
column8: All of the above.

column2: 23. When they see this road sign, drivers should:
column4: watch for this species crossing the road.
column8: drive carefully because the animal pictured on the sign is extremely rare in the area.

column2: 24. This road sign means:
column4: Drive with caution and be ready to stop
column8: You must come to a complete stop

column2: 25. This road sign means:
column8: Bicycles are not allowed in this area
